name: Fx4 change color of titlebar in maximized mode
description:
Alter the color of the titlebar of Fx4 when in maximized mode (NOT fullscreen). 

If you're like me and you don't like the odd blue top-bottom gradient, this style is for you! Brings back the classical left-to-right gradient.
additional_info:
Tested only on Windows XP (classical Win2k mode).

For more info see: http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=2147465

Credits go to: SoapyHamHocks
